description: Brock "The Big Show" Avery and Kip "The Giant" Johnson team up against Jessie "Cut-Throat" Colter and Nick "The Contender" Capra for a brutally hot battle of sexual domination. It's no surprise with these four muscled hunks fighting for the right to fuck, that our audience attendance is at full capacity. Big Show and Giant seem pretty cocky with youth on their side, but Cut-Throat and Contender have the superior muscle mass to their advantage. It's non-stop action as these four studs fight balls to the wall and finish with an all out fuck-fest, leaving the losers drenched in hot cum.
title: Big Show & The Giant VS Cut-Throat & The Contender - Live Match!
